trans-unit.source: ASAMBA (AsteroSeismic Approach towards understanding Massive Blue stArs) is a Marie Curie project that tries to infer deep physical understanding of the internal structure and evolution of massive stars in the light of recent very high precision space observations of pulsating massive stars.
trans-unit.target: ASAMBA(AsteroSeismic Approach towards understanding Massive Blue stArs)是一个玛丽-居里项目,该项目试图根据最近对脉冲大质量恒星的高精度空间观测,推断出对大质量恒星内部结构和演化的深层物理理解。

trans-unit.source: Python interface to peform asteroseismic modelling with the asamba grid
trans-unit.target: 利用Asamba网格进行小行星建模的Python接口。

trans-unit.source: The present Python package provides a convenient user interface that offers all available functionalities to the users, and allows them to interact with the database, and conduct their own research of interest. Needless to say that the user must have a full understanding of the meaning of the parameters he/she uses which steer the analysis. We strongly recommend reading the source code, the documentation around most of the code blocks, and the compiled documentation pages that ships in with this package.
trans-unit.target: 本Python包提供了一个方便的用户界面,为用户提供了所有可用的功能,并允许他们与数据库进行交互,并进行自己感兴趣的研究。毋庸置疑,用户必须充分理解他/她所使用的引导分析的参数的含义。我们强烈建议阅读源代码、围绕大多数代码块的文档,以及本软件包中附带的编译文档页。

trans-unit.source: Under this umbrella, a large grid of stellar models (using MESA) are computed, and the theoretical pulsation frequencies of each model (after iterating over various rotation rates) are also computed using the (GYRE) code. From this rich dataset (~3.8 million stellar models, and 42 million frequency lists), a PostgreSQL database is built, and is made openly accessible.
trans-unit.target: 在这个保护伞下,计算出了一个大型的恒星模型网格(使用MESA),还使用(GYRE)代码计算出了每个模型的理论脉动频率(在迭代了各种旋转速率之后)。从这个丰富的数据集(约380万个恒星模型,4200万个频率表)中,建立了一个PostgreSQL数据库,并开放给大家使用。
